Poison Shot

Shoot an arrow that deals {[DamageTable.Bow_PoisonShot.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage. On hit or land, this arrow creates 3m radius poison cloud that lasts 6s. Foes entering the cloud are poisoned and take {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Bow_Poison.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% weapon damage per second for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Bow_Poison.BaseDuration]}s. (This ability cannot headshot.)
Infected Arrows

Poison Shot's poison now does {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Bow_Poison_Upgrade.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% weapon damage per second for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Bow_Poison.BaseDuration]}s.
Direct Hit
Direct hits against targets are more powerful and now deal {[DamageTable.Bow_PoisonShot_Upgrade.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage.
Evade Shot
Leap back 5m and shoot an arrow dealing {[DamageTable.BowAttackJumpBack.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage to your target.
Evasive Knockback

Evade Shot <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">staggers</font> and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">pushes</font> the target back <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.BowAttackKnockBack.ImpactDistanceY]}m</font>.
Go the Distance

Evade Shot grants you a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Upgrade_Bow_EvasiveShot_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Upgrade_Bow_EvasiveShot_Haste.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.)</font>
Rain of Arrows

Shoot a barrage of arrows that covers a {[SpellDataTable_Bow.Spell_Bow_Spell_RainOfArrows.Radius]}m radius area and deals {[DamageTable.Bow_RainOfArrows_Attack.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage. (This ability cannot headshot.)
Barbed Arrows

Rain of Arrows causes bleed, dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_RainofArrows_Bleed.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% weapon damage per second for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_RainofArrows_Bleed.BaseDuration]}s.
Hooked Arrows

Rain of Arrows causes a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Bow_RainOfArrows_Slow.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}% slow</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Bow_RainOfArrows_Slow.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Slow reduces target's movement speed.)</font>
Rending Headshot

Headshots inflict <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">rend</font> reducing target's armor by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_RendHead.PhysicalArmor * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_RendHead.BaseDuration]}s</font>.
Catch Me If You Can

If surrounded by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">3</font> or more foes within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">3m</font> of you, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Skirmish_HasteWhenFoesNear.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% haste</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.)</font>
Closing In

Hitting a foe below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">50%</font> health reduces all bow ability cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Skirmish_CDRVsLow.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.
Impale

If you hit a foe with <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">100%</font> health, inflict a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Skirmish_SlowFull.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}% slow</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Skirmish_SlowFull.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Slow reduces target's movement speed.)</font>
Hunter's Insight

Hitting a foe with a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuff</font> grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Skirmish_StaminaVsDebuff.Stamina]}</font> stamina.
Dodge and Weave

(Cooldown {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Skirmish_HasteOnSwap_Timer.BaseDuration]}s.)</font>
Mark

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Debuff</font> durations last {[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Skirmish_DebuffDur.TargetStatusEffectDurationMult * 100]}% longer. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Does not affect crowd control debuffs.)</font>

The third arrow of Rapid Shot deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BowAbilityTable.Upgrade_Bow_RapidAccuracy_DmgOnLast.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> extra damage.

Fire an arrow that deals {[DamageTable.Bow_ExplosionShot_Projectile.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage on hit, then explodes on impact dealing an additional {[DamageTable.Bow_ExplosionShot_Explosion.DmgCoef * 100]}% damage to all targets within a {[SpellDataTable_Bow.Spell_Ability_Bow_ExplosiveShot_Explosion.Radius]}m radius.

Explosive Arrow direct hits inflict burn, dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_ExplosiveShot_Burn.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% weapon damage every second for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_ExplosiveShot_Burn.BaseDuration]}s.

Explosion damage increased to {[DamageTable.Bow_ExplosionShot_Explosion_Dmg.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage, but decreases the explosion radius to {[SpellDataTable_Bow.Spell_Ability_Bow_ExplosiveShot_Explosion_SizeChange.Radius]}m.
Long Range

Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Hunter_DmgVsDist.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> more damage to foes at least <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Hunter_DmgVsDist.DistFromDefender]}m</font> away.
Aim True

Armor is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Hunter_ArmorAimHeavy.PhysicalArmor * 100]}%</font> while aiming.

Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Hunter_DmgVsLow.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> more damage to targets below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">50%</font> health.
Opening Strike

Heavy attacks deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Hunter_HeavyDmgVsFull.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> increased damage to foes with <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">100%</font> health.

Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BowAbilityTable.Passive_Bow_Hunter_DmgVsLow.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> extra damage to any foe as long as you have not damaged them in the last <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Bow_Hunter_DmgOnFirst_Tracker.BaseDuration]}s</font>.
Arrow Range

When you land a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">headshot</font>, deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BowAbilityTable.Ultimate_Bow_Hunter.HeadshotDamage * 100]}%</font> more damage and have a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BowAbilityTable.Ultimate_Bow_Hunter_Refund.RefundAmmoPercentChance * 100]}%</font> chance to get your arrow back.

Great axe attacks against foes below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatAxeAbilityTable.Passive_Greataxe_Reaper_CritVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]}%</font> health have <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatAxeAbilityTable.Passive_Greataxe_Reaper_CritVsLowHP.CritChance * 100]}%</font> increased <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">critical chance</font>.

Gravity Well

An upward swing dealing {[DamageTable.GreatAxe_GravityWell.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage and projecting a powerful tear in reality that creates a vortex up to {[SpellDataTable_GreatAxe.Spell_GreatAxe_GravityWell_Projectile.CastDistance]}m away. The vortex pulls foes within {[SpellDataTable_GreatAxe.Spell_GreatAxe_GravityWell_Vortex.Radius]}m to its center and roots them for {[Type_StatusEffectData.GreatAxe_Vortex_Root.BaseDuration]}s. Foes within the vortex have their movement speed reduced by {[Type_StatusEffectData.GreatAxe_Vortex.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}% due to the intense gravity. The collapsing vortex ends after 3s with a damaging burst dealing {[DamageTable.GreatAxe_GravityWell_Burst.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage. (This effect cannot be dispelled.)

If you get hit while holding a great axe and are below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">50%</font> health, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Greataxe_Mauler_StamVsLowHp.Stamina]}</font> stamina. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">({[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Greataxe_Mauler_StamVsLowHp_Timer.BaseDuration]}s cooldown.)</font>

Center of Attention

While holding a great axe, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Greataxe_Mauler_DmgWhenFoesNear.DMGStandard * 100]}%</font> damage when <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">3</font> or more foes are within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_GreatAxe.Spell_Passive_Greataxe_Mauler_DmgWhenFoesNear.Radius]}m</font>.
Crowded Protection

While holding a great axe, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_Greataxe_Mauler_ArmorWhenFoesNear.PhysicalArmor * 100]}%</font> armor when <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">3</font> or more foes are within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_GreatAxe.Spell_Passive_Greataxe_Mauler_ArmorWhenFoesNear.Radius]}m</font>.
Enduring Strike

Adds <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">grit</font> to great axe heavy attacks. Also grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GreatAxeAbilityTable.Passive_Greataxe_Mauler_HeavyAddGrit.BaseDamageReduction * 100]}%</font> damage reduction while <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">grit</font> is active. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\n(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)</font>
Heavy Pull
Heavy attacks with a great axe <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">pull</font> foes closer to you.
Gravity

After you cause a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">pull</font>, your foe is <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">rooted</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Passive_GreatAxe_Gravity_Root.BaseDuration]}s</font>.
Mauler's Fury

Great axe attacks grant a stacking <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ultimate_Greataxe_Mauler.DMGStandard * 100]}%</font> damage increase for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ultimate_Greataxe_Mauler.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ultimate_Greataxe_Mauler.StackMax]} stacks.)</font>
Divine Embrace

Creates a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_LifeMagic.Spell_LifeStaff_DivineEmbrace.Radius]}m</font> radius area around an ally or a location on the ground that <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Heals</font> the target within for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Ability_Lifestaff_DivineEmbrace.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}%</font> weapon damage.\n\nCosts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.LifeStaff_TouchOfLife.ManaCost]}</font> Mana.

After <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">3</font> successful light attacks or aimed throws against the same target, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">empower</font>, granting a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Pass_3AtkEmpower.DMGSlash * 100]}%</font> damage increase for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Pass_3AtkEmpower.BaseDuration]}s</font> or until the next attack.
Relentless Fury

After a successful heavy attack, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">empower</font>, granting a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Pass_HeavyEmpower.DMGSlash * 100]}%</font> damage increase for the next <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">4</font> attacks within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Pass_HeavyEmpower.BaseDuration]}s</font>.
Desperate Refresh

All cooldowns are reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_CDRAtLowHP.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> when hitting an enemy with an attack while your health is below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_CDRAtLowHP.MyHealthPercent]}%</font>. (Max {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_CDRAtLowHP.NumberOfTrackedHits]} hits per attack.)
Against All Odds

Increase base damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_DMGPerNearbyEnemy.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> for every enemy within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_Hatchet.Hatchet_DmgPerNearbyEnemy_Detection.Radius]}m</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#808080">(Max {[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_DMGPerNearbyEnemy.MaxNumAroundMe]} targets.)</font>
Fortifying Strikes

Hitting a target with a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">heavy</font> attack grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">fortify</font>, increasing armor by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Pass_Fortify3Atk.PhysicalArmor * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Pass_Fortify3Atk.BaseDuration]}s</font>.
Frenzied Purge

Remove all <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">bleed</font>, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">burn</font>, and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">poison</font> effects from yourself if you hit an enemy while your health is below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_Berserk_PurgeDoTLowHP.MyHealthPercent]}%</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Cooldown {[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Pass_DoTPurgeTimer.BaseDuration]}s.)</font>
Defy Death

When you receive lethal damage, avoid death and become invulnerable for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Berserk_Immortal.BaseDuration]}s</font> and restore <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Ult_Passive_Hatchet_ImmortalWhen0HP.SetHealthOnFatalDamageTaken]} HP</font> + <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Ult_GainHP.HealthModifierBasePercent * 100]}%</font> of your base health upon activation. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">({[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Ult_ImmortalTimer.BaseDuration]}s cooldown.)</font>
Rending Throw

Throw a hatchet up to 25m, dealing {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_RendingThrow.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage and applying rend, reducing target's armor by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_RendingThrow_Rend.PhysicalArmor * -100]}% for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_RendingThrow_Rend.BaseDuration]}s.
Targeted Impact

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Rend</font> duration increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_RendThrow_DistanceBuffRend.TargetStatusEffectDurationMod]}s</font> if the target is further than <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_RendThrow_DistanceBuffRend.DistFromDefender]}m</font> away.
Opportunistic

If Rending Throw hits a target with an active <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuff</font>, it deals an additional <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_RendThrow_DmgOnDebuff.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> damage.
Second Wind

If Rending Throw hits a target with an active <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuff</font>, its cooldown is reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_RendThrow_CDROnDebuff.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.
Social Distancing

Throw a hatchet up to 25m forward, dealing {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_SocialDistancing.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage and inflicting {[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_SocialDist_Slow.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}% slow for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_SocialDist_Slow.BaseDuration]}s. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)\n\nIf standing still or moving backwards, you will dodge backwards obtaining momentary invulnerability. If moving sideways or forwards, you will continue moving unhindered.
Quick Power

If Social Distancing hits a target with an active <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuff</font>, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">haste</font>, increasing your movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_SocialDist_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_SocialDist_Haste.BaseDuration]}s</font>.
Stay Back
Social Distancing hits apply a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_SocialDist_Root.BaseDuration]}s root</font> to targets.
Infected Throw

Leap into the air and throw a hatchet that deals {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_InfectedThrow.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage. This attack inflicts {[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Infected_Disease.HealMod * -100]}% disease and {[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Infected_Weaken.DMGStandard * -100]}% weaken to your target for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Infected_Disease.BaseDuration]}s. (Disease reduces target's incoming healing efficiency and outgoing healing efficiency by half the incoming value.) (Weaken reduces target's outgoing damage.)
Mortal Power

Increases the duration of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">disease</font> and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">weaken</font> by an additional <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_Infected_BuffWeakenVsLowHP.TargetStatusEffectDurationMod]}s</font> when hitting targets below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Upgrade_Hatchet_Infected_BuffWeakenVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]}% </font>health.
Aerial Transmission

Creates a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_Hatchet.Hatchet_Spell_InfectedThrowAOE.Radius]}m </font>radius <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">disease</font> and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">weaken</font> cloud on impact that lingers in place for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">6s</font>.
Aimed Throw
Replaces block with an aimed throw that deals {[DamageTable.Hatchet_Damage_AimedThrow.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage. Hold block to enter aimed stance and press basic attack to throw.
Critical Throw

Increased critical hit chance of all <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">melee</font> attacks by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_ThrowingAxe_CriticalThrows.CritChance * 100]}%</font>.\n\nIncreased critical hit chance of all <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">ranged</font> attacks by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_ThrowingAxe_CriticalThrows_Ranged.CritChance * 100]}%</font>.
Exploitation

All attacks deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_ThrowingAxe_DmgVsDebuff.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> additional damage to targets with an active <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuff</font>.
On Fire
Every <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">third</font> thrown hatchet hit is a guaranteed critical hit.
Refreshing Throws

Thrown hatchets that hit targets with an active <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuff</font> reduce all hatchet ability cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_ThrowingAxe_CDROnDebuffThrow.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.
Rejuvenating Crits

Critical hits with light attacks and aimed throws regenerate <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Pass_StaminaGainCrit.Stamina]}</font> stamina.
Hurling Force

Thrown hatchets deal additional damage based on distance from the target. Up to a max of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_ThrowingAxe_StaminaOnDebuff.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> additional damage at <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Passive_Hatchet_ThrowingAxe_StaminaOnDebuff.LinearlyScaleToDistance]}m</font> or greater.
Adrenaline Rush

Dodging within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Hatchet_Pass_DodgeStaminaCost.BaseDuration]}s</font> of hitting a target with an ability consumes <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">25%</font> less stamina.
Persistent Hinderance

Hitting a target with a thrown hatchet extends the duration of all hatchet <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuffs</font> you applied on the target by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Ult_Passive_Hatchet_ExtendDebuffDuration.TargetStatusEffectDurationMult *100]}%</font>.\n\nAll attacks deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[HatchetAbilityTable.Ult_Passive_Hatchet_ExtendDebuffDuration_Damage.BaseDamage *100]}%</font> additional damage per <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuff</font> on the target. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">({[HatchetAbilityTable.Ult_Passive_Hatchet_ExtendDebuffDuration_Damage.PerStatusEffectOnTargetMax]} debuffs max)</font>
Power Shot

Overload your musket with gun powder, causing the next shot to deal {[DamageTable.MusketAttack_ChargedShot.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage, and an additional {[MusketAbilityTable.Ability_Musket_PowerShot.BaseDamage * 100]}% to hostile AI targets.\n\n(Does not stack with Powder Burn.)
Initial Engagement

When you hit with Power Shot, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">empower</font>, increasing damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Musket_PowerShot_Empower.DMGStandard * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Musket_PowerShot_Empower.BaseDuration]}s</font>.
First Blood

Power Shot deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[MusketAbilityTable.Upgrade_Musket_Power_DmgAtFullHealth.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> additional damage to targets with full health.
Bullseye

Power Shot <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">headshots</font> reduce Power Shot's <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">cooldown</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[MusketAbilityTable.Upgrade_Musket_Power_CDRonHeadshot.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.
Powder Burn

Overload your musket with gun powder, causing the next shot to deal {[DamageTable.Musket_Damage_PowderBurn.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage and inflict a burn that deals {[Type_StatusEffectData.Musket_PowderBurn_Burn.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% weapon damage per second for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Musket_PowderBurn_Burn.BaseDuration]}s.\n\n(Does not stack with Power Shot.)
Backdraft

Standard musket shots deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[MusketAbilityTable.Upgrade_Musket_Burn_DmgWhileOnFire.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> additional damage if they hit a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">burning</font> target.
Chronic Trauma

If Powder Burn is a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">headshot</font>, the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">burn</font> duration is extended by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[MusketAbilityTable.Upgrade_Musket_Burn_ExtendBurnOnHeadshot.TargetStatusEffectDurationMod]}s</font>.
Shooter's Stance

Player enters a crouching aim stance to enhance shooting performance. While in this stance, shots deal {[DamageTable.MusketAttack_ShootersStance.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage, mobility is reduced to zero and reload time is reduced by 75%. Shooter's Stance ends after 3 shots. (Power shot and powder burn can be used while inside shooter's stance.)
Shoot More
Shots fired before exiting stance increased to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">5</font>.
Marksman

If <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">3</font> consecutive shots hit the same target, reduce all other musket <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">cooldowns</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[MusketAbilityTable.Upgrade_Musket_Shooters_CDROnSameTarget.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.
Critical Reload

Landing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">2 headshots</font> within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Musket_Pass_HeadshotTracker.BaseDuration]}s</font> of each other reduces the duration of the next <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">reload</font>.
Called Shot

Increase musket damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[MusketAbilityTable.Passive_Musket_Sharpshooter_DMGIfAim2Sec.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> after aiming down sights for more than <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[MusketAbilityTable.Passive_Musket_Sharpshooter_DMGIfAim2Sec.InActionTime]}s</font>.
Quick Load

If <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Musket_Pass_TwoHitStack_Trigger.AddOnStackSize]}</font> or more targets are hit with a single shot, reduce the duration of the next <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">reload</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">({[Type_StatusEffectData.Musket_Pass_TwoHitStack_Trigger_Cooldown.BaseDuration]}s cooldown)</font>
Empowering Headshot

On a successful <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">headshot</font>, gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">empower</font>, increasing damage dealt by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Musket_Pass_EmpowerOnHeadshot.DMGStandard * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Musket_Pass_EmpowerOnHeadshot.BaseDuration]}s</font>.
Shell Shock

Headshots <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">weaken</font> targets, decreasing their damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Musket_Pass_Weaken.DMGStandard * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Musket_Pass_Weaken.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">({[MusketAbilityTable.Passive_Musket_Sharpshooter_DmgFallOff.ActivationCooldown]}s cooldown)</font>
Called Shot Resupply

Basic attack <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">headshots</font> reduce all musket ability <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">cooldowns</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[MusketAbilityTable.Passive_Musket_Sharpshooter_CDROnHeadshot.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.
Optimal Range

Musket shots deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[MusketAbilityTable.Passive_Musket_Sharpshooter_CritChanceDistance.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> increased base damage to targets <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[MusketAbilityTable.Passive_Musket_Sharpshooter_CritChanceDistance.DistFromDefender]}m</font> or further away from the player. \n\nAlso deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[MusketAbilityTable.Passive_Musket_Sharpshooter_CritChanceDistance_Helper.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> increased damage to targets within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[MusketAbilityTable.Passive_Musket_Sharpshooter_CritChanceDistance_Helper.DistFromDefender]}m</font>.
Heightened Precision

Successful hits with a musket grant a stackable <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">2.5%</font> damage increase. This effect ends after more than <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Musket_Pass_Damage_EveryADSShot.BaseDuration]}s</font> passes between shots. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Musket_Pass_Damage_EveryADSShot.StackMax]} stacks.)</font>
Deadeye

Grants a {[MusketAbilityTable.Ult_Passive_Musket_ZoomHeadshot.HeadshotDamage * 100]}% damage increase to all headshots. \n\nIf multiple targets are hit when you get a headshot, the next shot within {[Type_StatusEffectData.Musket_Ultimate_HeadshotTracker_Duration.BaseDuration]}s inflicts bleed to all targets the shot passes through, dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Musket_Ultimate_Headshot_Bleed.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% weapon damage every second for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Musket_Ultimate_Headshot_Bleed.BaseDuration]}s.
Traps

Deploy a trap that lasts for 30s. When triggered, it deals {[DamageTable.Musket_Trap.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage and causes its target to be rooted, immobilizing them for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Musket_Trap_Root.BaseDuration]}s.
Trapped Damage

Traps apply <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">rend</font> to targets that trigger them, increasing damage taken by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Musket_Trap_Rend.PhysicalArmor * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Musket_Trap_Rend.BaseDuration]}s</font>.
Scent of Blood

Dealing damage to a trapped target <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">heals</font> you for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[MusketAbilityTable.Upgrade_Musket_TrapLifeSteal.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}%</font> of weapon damage dealt.
Double Trap
Gain an extra trap per cooldown, allowing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">2</font> active traps to be placed in the world.
Sticky Bomb

Throw a short range bomb that sticks to anything it makes contact with.\n\nDetonation will occur 3s after impact dealing {[DamageTable.Musket_StickyBomb_Explosion.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage to all targets within a {[SpellDataTable_Musket.Musket_StickyBomb_Explosion.Radius]}m radius.
Unflinching Walk

Sticky Bomb grants the player <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Musket_Sticky_StaminaRegen.Stamina]}</font> stamina when it deals damage with an explosion.
Sticky Slow

Direct hits with the Sticky Bomb cause the target to be <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">slowed</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Musket_Sticky_Slow.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Musket_Sticky_Slow.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Slow reduces target's movement speed.)</font>
Stopping Power

A Powerful shot that deals {[DamageTable.Musket_Damage_StoppingPower.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage, staggering the target and knocking back {[DamageTable.Musket_Damage_StoppingPower.ImpactDistanceY]}m. (Can be fired from hip or while aiming down sights.)
Lasting Impression

Targets hit with Stopping Power are <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">exhausted</font>, reducing their stamina regeneration speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Musket_StoppingPower_Exhaust.StaminaRate * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Musket_StoppingPower_Exhaust.BaseDuration]}s</font>.
Supplementary Repulsion
