Momentum

Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[RapierAbilityTable.Rapier_BonusDMGAfterAbility.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> increased damage on your next light or heavy attack after performing an ability. Ends on hit or after <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Rapier_BonusDMGAfterAbility.BaseDuration]}s</font>.
Ice Spikes

Creates a trail of spikes that start from the player and go out in a straight line for 8m dealing {[DamageTable.IceMagic_Spikes.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage. The final spike is a Mighty Spike that will deal {[DamageTable.IceMagic_Spikes_End.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage, pushing back enemies. Pressing basic attack before the path fully forms will spawn the Mighty Spike early.\n\nCost {[ManaCosts_Player.IceMagic_Spikes.ManaCost]} Mana.
Refreshing Spikes

Cooldown for this ability reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.SpikesRefreshingSpikes.CooldownTimer * -100]}% </font> if an enemy is hit by the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Mighty Spike</font>.
Empowered Spikes

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Mighty Spike</font> damage increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.SpikesEmpoweredSpikes.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> when hitting an enemy below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.SpikesEmpoweredSpikes.TargetHealthPercent]}%</font> health.
Deadly Path

Increases damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">10%</font> and adds <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">stagger</font> to the path of spikes. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Does not increase Mighty Spike damage.)</font>
Spiky Reach
Ice shards fire from the sides of the Mighty Spike to hit a wider area. Each shard has a 6m range and deals {[DamageTable.IceMagic_Spike_Reach.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage.
Ice Storm

Create a 5m radius storm at the target area that deals {[DamageTable.IceMagic_IceStorm.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage every {[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_IceStorm.TickRate]}s for 5s. The storm also creates a frosted area that slows enemies in it by {[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_IceStorm.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}%. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.) (This effect cannot be dispelled.) Cost {[ManaCosts_Player.IceMagic_IceStorm.ManaCost]} Mana.
Weakening Gust

Ice Storm damage is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceStormWeakeningGust.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> to enemies below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceStormWeakeningGust.TargetHealthPercent]}%</font> health.
Storm Summoner
Ice Storm mana cost is decreased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">80%</font> while at full mana.
Punishing Storm

Increases Ice Storm damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceStormPunishingStorm.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> for each enemy in Ice Storm. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#808080">(Max {[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceStormPunishingStorm.MaxNumAroundMe]} targets.)</font>
Wind Chill

Blasts a column of freezing winds forward that pushes back enemies 5m and deals {[DamageTable.IceMagic_WindChill.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage every 0.2s for 2s. Wind Chill has a total range of 7m with the farthest 2m increasing damage 20% without pushing enemies. This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.) (Player is able to move during the attack.) Cost {[ManaCosts_Player.IceMagic_WindChill.ManaCost]} Mana. Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your ice gauntlet, hits with this ability inflict taunt for {[DamageTable.IceMagic_WindChill.TauntDuration]}s. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)
Enduring Chill
Increase duration of Wind Chill by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">1s</font>.
Chilling Blast

Increase the damage of the last <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">2m</font> of the Wind Chill range by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.WindChillShatter.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font>.
Cold Reach

Increase damage of basic attacks by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceTempestPass1.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> for targets within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceTempestPass1.DistFromDefender]}m</font> of player.
Critical Rejuvenation
Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceTempestPass2.Mana * 100]}</font> mana whenever you critically hit a target.
Energized Critical

Increase critical damage of ice gauntlet abilities by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceTempestPass3.CritDamage * 100]}%</font> while stamina is full.
Gathering Storm

Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceTempestPass4.Mana * 100]}</font> mana whenever you hit with <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceTempestPass4.NumConsecutiveHits]}</font> consecutive light attacks.
Critical Frost

Increase <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">critical chance</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceTempestPass5.CritChance * 100]}%</font> when hitting an enemy in a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">frosted area</font> or when hitting an enemy with <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">frostbite</font>.
Heavy Freeze

Heavy attacks will <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">root</font> a target for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_Freeze.BaseDuration]}s</font> if they are standing in Ice Storm or have <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">frostbite</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(This effect has a {[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_Freeze_Cooldown.BaseDuration]}s cooldown after root expires.)</font>
Ultimate Chill

Ice gauntlet abilities <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">chill</font> targets, increasing ice damage dealt to the target by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceTempestUltimate_Helper.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_UltimateChill.BaseDuration]}s</font>. Ice Pylon attacks do not apply chill.
Ice Pylon

Place a pylon that fires ice projectiles at enemies within 20m. Projectiles deal {[DamageTable.IceMagic_Pylon.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage if they hit. Ice Pylon health will be 20% of players max health. Ice Pylon creates a 1m radius frosted area around itself and lasts for 15s unless it is destroyed. Hold ability input for 1s to despawn Ice Pylon.\n\nCost {[ManaCosts_Player.IceMagic_IcePylon.ManaCost]} Mana.
Greater Pylon

Increases damage of Ice Pylon by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.IcePylonGreaterPylon.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> against <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">slowed</font> targets.
Pylon Regen
Ice Pylon regenerates to full health <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_PylonRefresh.BaseDuration]}s</font> after last damage taken.
Pylon Dodge
Dodging increases Ice Pylon rate of fire for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">3s</font>.
Pylon Refresh

A successful hit from the Ice Pylon extends its lifetime by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">1s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Maximum {[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_PylonCooldownSafety.BaseDuration]}s.)</font>
Ice Shower

Summon a shower of ice that creates a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">frosted area</font> approximately <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">1m by 5m</font> that lasts for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">4s</font>. Enemies that enter the Ice Shower will be stricken with a powerful <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">frostbite</font>.

Frostbite <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">roots</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_IceShower_Freeze.BaseDuration]}s</font>, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">slows</font> movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_Frostbite.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}%</font>, and will remain on target for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_Frostbite_Dur3.BaseDuration]}s</font> after exiting the Ice Shower. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Ice Shower's root can only be applied once every {[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_IceShower_Freeze_Cooldown.BaseDuration]}s to the same target.)</font><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">

(This effect cannot be dispelled.)</font>

Cost <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.IceMagic_IceShower.ManaCost]}</font> Mana.
Enduring Shower
Increase Ice Shower duration to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">7s</font>.
Quick Shower

Any ally, including self, will get a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_QuickShower_Dur2.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_QuickShower_Dur2.BaseDuration]}s</font> when entering Ice Shower.
Frigid Showers

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Frostbite</font> applies <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">rend</font> to target, reducing their defense by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_Frostbite_Rend.PhysicalArmor * -100]}%</font>.
Entombed

Entomb yourself in ice to become invulnerable and greatly increase mana regeneration. The tomb lasts for 10s but can be destroyed early. Tomb health will be 50% of players max health. Press ability input, block, or dodge to exit the tomb normally or press basic attack to exit while causing a damaging push at the cost of {[ManaCosts_Player.IceMagic_Entombed_Break.ManaCost]} mana. The push deals {[DamageTable.IceMagic_Entombed_Break.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage to enemies in a 3m radius. Cost {[ManaCosts_Player.IceMagic_Entombed.ManaCost]} Mana.
Strengthened Tomb

Gain a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_StrengthenedTomb.PhysicalArmor * 100]}% fortify</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_StrengthenedTomb.BaseDuration]}s</font> after breaking out of Entombed. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Fortify increases armor)</font>
Cleansing Tomb
Cleanse all <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuffs</font> when Entombed activates.
Blocking Stamina

Blocking an attack with the ice gauntlet will convert mana to stamina. Converts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_BlockingStamina.Mana * -1]}</font> mana to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_BlockingStamina.Stamina]}</font> stamina.
Quick Frost

Increase movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_QuickFrost.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}%</font> in a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">frosted area</font>.
Empowered Frost

Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_EmpoweredFrost.Mana]}</font> mana for each attack performed while in a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">frosted area</font>.
Frozen Touch

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Slow</font> enemies by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_FrozenTouch.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_FrozenTouch.BaseDuration]}s</font> when they hit you with a melee attack while your health is full. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Slow reduces target's movement speed.)</font>
Refreshing Frost

Reduce the cooldown of all ice gauntlet abilities by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[IceMagicAbilityTable.IceConjurorPass5.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> when casting an ability in a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">frosted area</font>.
Defiant Freeze

Casting an ice gauntlet ability grants a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_DefiantFreeze.PhysicalArmor * 100]}% fortify</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.IceMagic_DefiantFreeze.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Fortify increases armor)</font>
Ultimate Frost

Doubles Ice Pylon's health and extends Ice Pylon's <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">frosted area</font> radius to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">5m</font>. Standing in this <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">frosted area</font> doubles Quick Frost and Empowered Frost bonuses.
Claw Shot

Shoot forward a four pronged claw attached to a chain from the muzzle. The projectile will travel up to 14m and cannot pull you upwards more than 3m. If it connects to an enemy it will deal {[DamageTable.Blunderbuss_ClawShot_Attack.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage and inflict root for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_ClawShot_Root.BaseDuration]}s before quickly pulling you towards them. The pull can be canceled by any ability use or primary fire. Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your blunderbuss, this ability inflicts taunt for {[DamageTable.Blunderbuss_ClawShot_Attack.TauntDuration]}s when it hits. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)
In-and-Out

Upon usage, restore <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_ClawShot_Mod1.Stamina]}</font> stamina every second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_ClawShot_Mod1.BaseDuration]}s</font>.
Combat Readiness

Landing a pellet, even if blocked, lowers the cooldown of this ability by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_ClawShot_Mod2.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> each.
Mobile Overload

Successful pulls will automatically grant <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">1</font> loaded ammunition. If you currently have <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">2</font> loaded ammunition this will exceed the max cap and grant a third.
Net Shot

Fire a large net out of the blunderbuss that deals {[DamageTable.Blunderbuss_Net_Shot.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage and slows targets it hits by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_NetShot.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}% for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_NetShot.BaseDuration]}s. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.) If standing still or moving backwards, the recoil from this attack will knock you further backwards. If moving sideways or forwards, you will continue forward unhindered.
Fast Hands
If Net Shot hits a target, reduce its cooldown by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_NetShot_Mod1.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.
Barbed Netting

Net Shot's initial hit is reduced to {[DamageTable.Blunderbuss_Net_Shot_Upgraded_Final.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage. However, it now deals {[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_BarbedNet.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% additional weapon damage as bleeding each second for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_BarbedNet.BaseDuration]}s.
Apparatus

The net now inflicts a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_NetShot_Upgraded.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}% slow</font> that degrades to normal move speed over <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_NetShot_Upgraded.BaseDuration]}s</font>.
Blast Shot

Blast immense wind out of the blunderbuss knocking down any target immediately in front of you. Blast Shot deals {[DamageTable.Blunderbuss_Vortex_Knockback.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage. This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.) Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your blunderbuss, hits with this ability inflict taunt for {[DamageTable.Blunderbuss_Vortex_Knockback.TauntDuration]}s. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)
Preparation

Blast Shot applies <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">rend</font>, decreasing armor of all targets affected by this ability by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_Increase_Damage_Taken.PhysicalArmor * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_Increase_Damage_Taken.BaseDuration]}s</font>.
Lingering Flow

The area <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">10m</font> in front of you remains influenced by wind for the next <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_LingeringFlow.BaseDuration]}s</font>. You and your allies gain a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_LingeringFlow.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}%</font> move speed bonus while in the area.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\n(This effect cannot be dispelled.)</font>
Stock Smash

You can no longer aim down sights and perform a melee attack with your gun instead.
This attack will always <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">slow</font> the target by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_GunButt.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_GunButt.BaseDuration]}s</font>. If you hit a target and have <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_GunButtStamCost.Stamina * -1]}</font> or more stamina, Stock Smash will consume that stamina to push back the target <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">4m</font> and grant <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">1</font> loaded ammunition; if you currently have <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">2</font> loaded ammunition this will exceed the max cap and grant a third. 

Stock Smash can be used during abiltiies and primary fires to cancel them.
Last Chance

Whenever you take a hit and your health is below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_LastChance.MyHealthPercent]}%</font> gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">fortify</font>, increasing armor by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_LastChance.PhysicalArmor * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_LastChance.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">({[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_LastChanceCooldown.BaseDuration]}s cooldown)</font>
Future Endeavors
Basic shots restore <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_FutureEndeavor_Stam.Stamina]}</font> stamina per pellet hit.
Bite Back

Every pellet that is a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">headshot</font> reduces all cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_BiteBack.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.
Future Planning

Using an ability reduces all other ability cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_FuturePlanning.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.
Deep Load

The last shot loaded into the blunderbuss will do <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_DeepLoad.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> increased damage.
Unload

The next shot fired within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_Nine.BaseDuration]}s</font> after triggering an ability will have <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">8</font> pellets instead of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">6</font>.
Splitting Grenade

Shoot a grenade out of the blunderbuss that can bounce up to 4 times. The Splitting Grenade will detonate after 1.5s but can be detonated early by reactivating its ability key within this time period. Upon detonation, it will create 3 mini grenades that will disperse and explode 1s after landing, dealing {[DamageTable.Blunderbuss_SplittingGrenade.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage in a 3m radius area. (Each successive grenade hit against the same target deals {[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Ability_Blunderbuss_SplittingGrenade.BaseDamage * -100]}% less base damage.)
Soften

Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_SplittingGrenade_Mod1.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> increased damage to targets greater than <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_SplittingGrenade_Mod1.TargetHealthPercent]}%</font> health.
Delayed Escape

Any grenade hit grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">haste</font>, increasing movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_SplittingGrenade_Movespeed.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_SplittingGrenade_Movespeed.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Multiple hits will refresh the duration.)</font>
Incendiary Bursts

Splitting Grenade explosions inflict burn on hit, dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_SplittingGrenade_Burn.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% weapon damage per second for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_SplittingGrenade_Burn.BaseDuration]}s. (Stacks up to {[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_SplittingGrenade_Burn.StackMax]} times.)
Azoth Shrapnel Blast

Fire 5 shots in a horizontal fan in front of you while pushing yourself backwards. Each shot will deal {[DamageTable.Blunderbuss_Azoth_Shrapnel.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage. \n\n(Every consecutive hit on the same target will deal {[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Ability_Blunderbuss_AzothShrapnelBlast.BaseDamage * -100]}% less damage than the previous hit.)
Reach
Increase the range of this attack from <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">12m</font> to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">16m</font>.
Discord
Fire <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">4</font> additional pellets with each use of this ability.
Refresh

Each individual hit from this ability or from the blunderbuss primary fire will lower the cooldown of this ability by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_AzothShrapnelBlast_Mod3.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.
Azoth Bomb

Fire a singular bomb down the center of the fan. This bomb will implant itself in the world and explode dealing {[DamageTable.Blunderbuss_ASB_Bomb.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage in a 3m area after a 1s delay
Mortar Charge

Load the blunderbuss with heavy canisters. For the next 15s or 3 shots, shots will no longer fire multiple pellets but instead will fire a heavy, fast diving, mortar-style canister that causes a tall explosion upon impact, dealing {[DamageTable.Blunderbuss_Mortar_Charge.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage in a 3m area. \n\nIf the target is {[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Ability_Blunderbuss_MortarShot.DistFromDefender]}m away or further, they will take {[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Ability_Blunderbuss_MortarShot.BaseDamage * 100]}% increased damage from the mortar.
Steady
Each hit grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_SmallStam.Stamina]}</font> stamina.
Freedom

Firing grants a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_Freedom.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_Freedom.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.)</font>
Streak
Gain an extra canister, you can now fire up to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">4</font> shots.
Artillery

Direct damage from abilities is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_Artillery.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> if the victim is <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_Artillery.DistFromDefender]}m</font> or further away.
Buckshot

Deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_Buckshot.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> increased damage to any target as long as you have not damaged them in the last <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_Buckshot.BaseDuration]}s</font>.
Fortifying Aggression

Successful hits within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_FortifyCloseRange.DistFromDefender]}m</font> grant <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">fortify</font>, increasing armor by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_FortifyCloseRange.PhysicalArmor * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_FortifyCloseRange.BaseDuration]}s</font>.
Ramp

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Reloads</font> give you a damage boost of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_Ramp.DMGStandard * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_Ramp.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_Ramp.StackMax]} stacks.)</font>
Run and Gun

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Reloading</font> gives you a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_Run_And_Gun.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% haste</font> that lasts for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_Run_And_Gun.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed.)</font>
On a Roll

Triggering an ability grants a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_AbilityRamp.PhysicalArmor * 100]}% fortify</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_AbilityRamp.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Stacks up to {[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_AbilityRamp.StackMax]} times.) (Fortify increases armor)</font>
Extended Chamber

Holding onto <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">2</font> loaded ammunition for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_OverloadTimer.BaseDuration]}s</font> after a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">reload</font> will load a 3rd active ammunition.
Double Down

Once every <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Blunderbuss_ChargeCooldownOnCooldown.BaseDuration]}s</font>, your next ability used will have its cooldown reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[BlunderbussAbilityTable.Blunderbuss_Charge.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.
Arcane Smite

Leap forward and strike the ground with arcane force dealing {[DamageTable.1H_Flail_Ability_Slam.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage to all targets within {[SpellDataTable_Flail.Spell_Flail_Slam_AOE.Radius]}m of the impact. Leave behind a hazardous area at the impact point that inflicts a stack of Impairment for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.BaseDuration]}s to all targets that enter. Impairment deals {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%weapon damage per second and inflicts weaken, reducing their base damage by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.DMGStandard * -100]}%. (Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.StackMax]} stacks) This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)
Epic Flail

Smite hits reduce its own cooldown by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Upgrade_Flail_Slam_Upgrade1.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> per target hit. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[FlailAbilityTable.Upgrade_Flail_Slam_Upgrade1.NumberOfTrackedHits]} targets)</font>
Ironclad Superiority

Grants a bonus based on what shield type is equipped: •Round Shield - Smite deals {[FlailAbilityTable.Upgrade_Flail_Slam_Upgrade2.BaseDamage * 100]}% more base weapon damage. •Kite Shield - Smite will now stagger targets hit, but damage is reduced to {[DamageTable.1H_Flail_Ability_Slam_Stagger.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage. •Tower Shield - Gain {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Slam_Upgrade_Fortify.PhysicalArmor * 100]}% fortfy for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Slam_Upgrade_Fortify.BaseDuration]}s when smite is activated. (Fortify increases armor)
Deflecting Frailty

Allies that enter the hazardous area obtain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Deflecting Frailty</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Slam_AllyBuff_WeakenAttackers.BaseDuration]}s</font>, which when attacked will inflict a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">stacking weaken</font> to enemy attackers when hit, reducing the enemy's damage dealt by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Slam_WeakenStack.DMGStandard * -100]}%</font> per stack for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Slam_WeakenStack.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Slam_WeakenStack.StackMax]} stacks)</font> 

Additionally while the effect is active, when allies are hit, they gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[GlobalAbilityTable.Global_Flail_SlamAbility_Lifesteal.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}% lifesteal for </font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Slam_Lifesteal_Tracker.BaseDuration]}s</font>. 

(Deflecting Frailty scales with Focus, increasing its duration to up to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Slam_AllyBuff_WeakenAttackers.DurationAttbScalingMaxValue]}</font> seconds.)
Arcane Vortex

Swirl the flail above the player's head dealing 4 rapid hits of {[DamageTable.1H_Flail_Ability_Blast.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage in a 3m radius around the player. After the first spin is completed, trigger a {[SpellDataTable_Flail.Spell_Flail_AuraBlast_AOE.Radius]}m blast of energy granting {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_AuraBlast_Empower.DMGStandard * 100]}% empower for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_AuraBlast_Empower.BaseDuration]}s to all allies inside the radius. This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)
Flailbird

Hitting targets <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_AuraBlast_StackingRoot_Tracker.AddOnStackSize]}</font> times with arcane vortex will inflict them with <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">root</font>, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">immobilizing</font> them for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_AuraBlast_StackingRoot.BaseDuration]}s</font>.
Accelerated Advantage

Hitting a target with arcane vortex grants a stacking <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">haste</font> on self, increasing movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_AuraBlast_Haste_Self.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_AuraBlast_Haste_Self.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_AuraBlast_Haste_Self.StackMax]} stacks)</font> \n\nAllies within the radius of the attack are granted a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_AuraBlast_Haste_Ally.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}% </font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_AuraBlast_Haste_Ally.BaseDuration]}s</font>.
Flailing Stability

All allies within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_Flail.Spell_Flail_AuraBlast_AOE_Upgraded.Radius]}m</font> of player during the arcane vortex are <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">cleansed</font> of crowd control status effects (Root, Stun, Slow) and are immune to them for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_AuraBlast_CCEffectImmunity.BaseDuration]}</font> seconds. 

All allies inside are also <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">healed</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_AuraBlast_Heal.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}%</font> weapon damage. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Healing scales exclusively with Focus)</font> 

(Crowd Control Immunity scales with Focus, increasing its duration to up to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_AuraBlast_CCEffectImmunity.DurationAttbScalingMaxValue]}</font> seconds.)
Arcane Eruption

Drag the head of the flail against the ground causing an eruption of arcane energy in front of the player, dealing {[DamageTable.1H_Flail_Ability_Burst.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage and inflicting two stacks of Impairment for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.BaseDuration]}s to all targets hit. Automatically follow up with an additional melee attack that deals {[DamageTable.1H_Flail_Ability_Burst_FollowUp.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage. Impairment deals {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% weapon damage per second and inflicts weaken, reducing their base damage by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.DMGStandard * -100]}%. (Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.StackMax]} stacks)
Crippling Strike

Targets hit with the first attack of burst are <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">slowed</font>, reducing their movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Burst_Slow.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Burst_Slow.BaseDuration]}s</font>.
Debilitating Extension

The follow up attack extends the duration of all debilitate status effects (Rend, Weaken, Exhaust, Disease) on the target by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Upgrade_Flail_Burst_Upgrade2.TargetStatusEffectDurationMult * 100]}%</font>.
Supportive Blessing

The follow up attack <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">consumes</font> one stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Impairment</font> on the target hit, triggering a chain that will bounce up to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_Flail.Spell_Flail_Burst_ChainHeal.MaxChainNum]}</font> times to allies within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_Flail.Spell_Flail_Burst_ChainHeal.Radius]}m</font> of player, granting <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Burst_HealChain.ModDmgBasedMultValue_ForTooltip * 100]}%</font> of its total damage as <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">health</font> to each ally it chains to, and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Burst_HealChain_Self.ModDmgBasedMultValue_ForTooltip * 100]}%</font> of its total damage to self. \n\n<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Healing scales exclusively with Focus.)</font>
Oppressive Advantage

Abilities and Heavy attack hits against targets with less than <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Eldritch_Passive1.TargetHealthPercent]}%</font> health, increase incoming healing by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Passive_OnHitLowHP_Anointed.HealMod * 100]}%</font> and gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Passive_OnHitLowHP_Haste.MoveSpeedMod * 100]}%</font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f"> haste</font> to self for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Passive_OnHitLowHP_Anointed.BaseDuration]}s</font>. 
(Incoming healing increase scales with Focus, increasing its power to up to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Passive_OnHitLowHP_Anointed.PotencyAttbScalingMaxValue * 100]}%</font>) 

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Haste increases movement speed)</font>
Weighted Superiority

Grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Cooldown Reduction</font> based on actions performed in different <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">equip loads</font>: 

•<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Heavy</font> - <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Eldritch_Passive2.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> cooldown reduction when hit or blocking a hit. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">({[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Eldritch_Passive2.ActivationCooldown]}s cooldown)</font> 
•<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Medium</font> - <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Eldritch_Passive2_Helper_Med.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> cooldown reduction when dodging an attack. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">({[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Eldritch_Passive2_Helper_Med.ActivationCooldown]}s cooldown)</font> 
•<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Light</font> - <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Eldritch_Passive2_Helper_Light.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> cooldown reduction when hitting a target. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">({[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Eldritch_Passive2_Helper_Light.ActivationCooldown]}s cooldown)</font>
Happy Flails

Hitting a target with a basic attack within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Passive_AfterAbilityHeavy.BaseDuration]}s</font> of using an ability will inflict <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">exhaust</font>, reducing stamina regen rate by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Passive_Exhaust.StaminaRate * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Passive_Exhaust.BaseDuration]}s</font>.
Spiky Impairment

Being hit or blocking a hit from a melee attack while above {[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Eldritch_Passive4.MyHealthPercent]}% health inflicts a stack of Impairment for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.BaseDuration]}s on the attacker, dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% weapon damage per second and inflicting weaken, reducing their base damage by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.DMGStandard * -100]}%. (Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.StackMax]} stacks) \n\n({[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Eldritch_Passive4.ActivationCooldown]}s cooldown)
Vital Embrace

While at or below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Eldritch_Passive5.MyHealthPercent]}%</font> health, all flail attacks grant <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Eldritch_Passive5.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}%</font> lifesteal while attacking targets. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Eldritch_Passive5.NumberOfTrackedHits]} targets)</font> \n\nWhile above <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Eldritch_Passive5_Helper.MyHealthPercent]}%</font> health, all flail attacks extend the duration of damage over time effects on targets by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Eldritch_Passive5_Helper.TargetStatusEffectDurationMult * 100]}%</font>.
Leader of the Pack

When no allies are within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_Flail.Spell_Flail_Passive_PerNearbyAlly_Detection.Radius]}m</font>, all flail attacks deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Eldritch_Passive6.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> more base damage. \n\nWhen 1 or more allies are within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_Flail.Spell_Flail_Passive_PerNearbyAlly_Detection.Radius]}m</font>, they gain empower, increasing their damage dealt by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Passive_NearbyAlly_Empower.DMGStandard * 100]}%</font>.
Better Together

While within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_Flail.Spell_Flail_Ultimate_PerNearby_Detection.Radius]}m</font> of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Ultimate_Flail_Eldritch.NumAroundMe]}</font> or more allies, grant passive <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">healing</font> to self and all allies that heals for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Ultimate_HealOverTime.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}%</font> weapon damage every <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Ultimate_HealOverTime.TickRate]}</font> seconds. \n\n<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Healing scales exclusively with Focus)</font>
Barrage

Sprint forward up to 10m. Upon reactivating the ability, pressing basic attack, or reaching the end of the sprint, leap forward up to an additional 6m and slam to the ground, dealing {[DamageTable.1H_Flail_Ability_Charge_FlippingAttack.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage to targets in range of the flail during the leap and {[DamageTable.1H_Flail_Ability_Charge.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage upon landing, staggering targets on impact. (Character collision is disabled while sprinting forward) Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your Flail, this ability inflicts taunt for {[DamageTable.1H_Flail_Ability_Charge.TauntDuration]}s when it hits. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)
Defensive Rush

Hitting a target with any of barrage's hits will grant a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Charge_FortifyOnHit.PhysicalArmor * 100]}% fortify</font>. The fortify has a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Charge_FortifyOnHit.BaseDuration]}s</font> duration, and every hit extends the duration of the status effect by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Charge_FortifyOnHit.BaseDuration]}s</font> to a max of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Charge_FortifyOnHit.DurationMax]}s</font>. \n\n<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Moving through targets with the Bulldoze upgrade will also extend the duration of the effect)</font>
Abiding Superiority

Grants a bonus to Barrage based on what <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">shield type</font> is equipped: 

•<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Round Shield</font> - Barrage hits for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Upgrade_Flail_Charge_Upgrade2.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> more base weapon damage. 
•<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Kite Shield</font> - Barrage hits inflict <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Charge_Slow.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}%</font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f"> slow</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f"> {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Charge_Slow.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(This will also slow targets moved through with the Bulldoze upgrade)</font> 
•<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Tower Shield</font> - Barrage gains <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">grit</font> while active. 

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Slow reduces movement speed)</font> 
<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)</font>
Bulldoze

Barrage can now <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">block</font> attacks while charging forward without consuming stamina, and will <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">push</font> all enemies moved through to the side. \n\n<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(This will also cause the targets moved through to be taunted if using a carnelian gem)</font>
Flailure to Launch

Barrage's attack now triggers a {[SpellDataTable_Flail.Spell_Flail_Slam_Barrage_AOE.Radius]}m blast of energy around the target on hit, dealing {[DamageTable.1H_Flail_Ability_Charge_AOE.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage to all nearby targets, and granting fortify to all allies within the radius, increasing armor by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Charge_Fortify.PhysicalArmor * 100]}% for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Charge_Fortify.BaseDuration]}s.
Trip
Swing the Flail forward latching onto a target dealing {[DamageTable.1H_Flail_Ability_Trip.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage and knocking them to the ground.
Flailing Duration

Tripping a target applies a special debuff to the target lasting <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Trip_EnemyDebuff_AllyDoTDurReduction.BaseDuration]}s</font>. Allies that hit the affected enemy will reduce the duration of all damage over time effects on themselves by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">10%</font> per hit while active. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">({[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Trip_AllyDoTDurRed.ApplicationCooldown]}s cooldown)</font>
You've Got Flail

Hitting weakened targets with trip will inflict <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Trip_Rend.PhysicalArmor * -100]}% rend</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Trip_Rend.BaseDuration]}s</font> on the target, and granting <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Trip_Fortify.PhysicalArmor * 100]}% </font> <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">fortify</font> on self for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Trip_Fortify.BaseDuration]}s</font>. 

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Rend decreases armor)</font> 
<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Fortify increases armor)</font>
Destabilize
Adds a follow up heavy attack, that deals {[DamageTable.1H_Flail_Ability_Trip_FollowUp.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage.
Warding Bludgeon

Perform a spinning leap then swing the flail down to strike targets, dealing {[DamageTable.1H_Flail_Ability_DefensiveStrike.DmgCoef * 100]}% weapon damage. While leaping, trigger a burst of energy, granting a reinforced fortify to self and all allies within 3m of player, increasing armor by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_DefensiveStrike_Reinforced.PhysicalArmor * 100]}% for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_DefensiveStrike_Reinforced.BaseDuration]}s or until {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_DefensiveStrike_Reinforced.StopOnHitCount]} hits are taken. This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.) Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your Flail, this ability inflicts taunt for {[DamageTable.1H_Flail_Ability_DefensiveStrike_TAUNT.TauntDuration]}s to all enemies within 8m. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)
Stable Impairment

Stamina damage taken is reduced by {[FlailAbilityTable.Upgrade_Flail_DefensiveStrike_Upgrade1_Helper.BlockDamageReduction * 100]}% for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_DefensiveStrike_BlockTracker.BaseDuration]}s after activating block. \n\nAdditionally, blocking hits while the reinforced fortify from Warding Bludgeon is active will Inflict a stack of Impairment for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.BaseDuration]}s on the attacker, dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% weapon damage per second and weakening them, reducing their base damage by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.DMGStandard * -100]}%. (Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.StackMax]} stacks)
Best Friends

Upon hitting a enemy target, a nearby ally within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_Flail.Spell_Flail_DefensiveStrike_ConnectChain.Radius]}m</font> is selected and you become linked to them. While the connection is active, they gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">empower</font>, increasing their base damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_DefensiveStrike_Upgrade_Empower.DMGStandard * 100]}%</font>, and you both gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">damage absorption</font>, reducing damage taken by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_DefensiveStrike_Upgrade_Absorption.ABSStandard * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_DefensiveStrike_Upgrade_Absorption.BaseDuration]}s</font>, or until players are more than <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_Flail.Spell_Flail_DefensiveStrike_Ally.Radius]}m</font> apart from each other.<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">\n\n(This effect cannot be dispelled.)</font>
Vital Suppressant

While at or above <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Crusader_Passive1_Helper.MyHealthPercent]}%</font> health, reduce damage taken by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Crusader_Passive1_Helper.BaseDamageReduction * 100]}%</font>. \n\nWhile below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Crusader_Passive1.MyHealthPercent]}%</font> health, reduce the attackers stamina damage dealt while blocking by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Crusader_Passive1.BlockDamageReduction * 100]}%</font>.
Cured Flailment

The first target hit with a heavy attack within {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Passive_AfterAbilityHeavy.BaseDuration]}s of using an ability will cleanse {[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Crusader_Passive2.NumStatusEffectStacksToRemove]} stack of any debuff from self, and will also inflict a stack of Impairment for {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.BaseDuration]}s to the target hit, dealing {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}% weapon damage per second and weakening them, reducing their base damage by {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.DMGStandard * -100]}%. (Max {[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_HexDoT.StackMax]} stacks)
Reductive Superiority

Grants status effect duration modifications on self based on what <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">shield type</font> is equipped: 

•<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Round Shield</font> - Increased base duration of all limited duration buffs on player by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Crusader_Passive3.StatusEffectDurationReduction * 100]}%</font> 
•<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Kite Shield</font> - Decrease base duration of damage over time and debilitating effects on player by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Crusader_Passive3_Helper1.StatusEffectDurationReduction * -100]}%</font> 
•<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Tower Shield</font> - Decrease base duration of crowd control effects on player by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Crusader_Passive3_Helper2.StatusEffectDurationReduction * -100]}%</font>
Flail Mary

While stamina is at or below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Crusader_Passive4.MyStaminaPercent]}%</font>, activating an ability will grant <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Crusader_Passive4.Stamina]}</font> stamina. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">({[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Crusader_Passive4.ActivationCooldown]}s cooldown)</font>
Mitigated Protection

When blocking a hit, gain a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Passive_BlockedHit_DurStacking.BaseDuration]}s</font> tracking status effect, every blocked hit extends the duration of the status effect by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Passive_BlockedHit_DurStacking.BaseDuration]}s</font> to a max of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Passive_BlockedHit_DurStacking.DurationMax]}s</font>, and while the effect is active, gain variable damage absorption based on current health percent and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">equip load</font>: 

•<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Heavy</font> - <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">5%</font> absorption at full health increasing to a max of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Crusader_Passive5_Helper.HealthDamageMitigation_Endvalue * 100]}%</font> mitigation as health decreases 
•<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Medium</font> - <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">3%</font> absorption at full health increasing to a max of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Crusader_Passive5_Helper1.HealthDamageMitigation_Endvalue * 100]}%</font> mitigation as health decreases 
•<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Light</font> - <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">1%</font> absorption at full health increasing to a max of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Crusader_Passive5_Helper2.HealthDamageMitigation_Endvalue * 100]}%</font> mitigation as health decreases
Reinforced Vitality

Increase your max health by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[FlailAbilityTable.Passive_Flail_Crusader_Passive6.PhysicalArmorMaxHealthMod * 100]}%</font> of your physical armor rating while the flail is equipped.\n\n<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(This effect is active as long as the flail is equipped, even if the flail is sheathed)</font>
Human Shield

Hitting a target with an <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">ability</font> while within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_Flail.Spell_Flail_Ultimate_ChainDamageSplit.Radius]}m</font> of an ally, applies a status effect linking yourself and a single ally to each other for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Ultimate_AllyDamageSplit.BaseDuration]}s</font>. While the effect is active the ally will only take <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Ultimate_AllyDamageSplit.DamageSplitTaken * 100]}%</font> of the incoming damage and causing you to inherit <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.Status_Flail_Ultimate_AllyDamageSplit.DamageSplitTakenBySource * 100]}%</font> of the incoming damage they didn't take. \n\n<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Cannot be applied to targets that already have this effect, or self if you already have the effect applied to an ally)</font>
Stoneform
Detonate

Cannon Blast
Dark Ascent

Fire Storm
